topics.body:
As much as I like the stereotypical cthulu design, the original story discribes him as looking somewhere between an octopus, a dragon and a man.  I wish more artists would go all out with that. At least adding some more dragon like details. 

It also describes him having forefeet meaning he may not be bipedal. Not consistently at least.
